title: Natasha

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A magical cat. Once a powerful wizard's familiar, Natasha was abandoned after her master was consumed by the very necromantic forces he sought to control. Now she patrols the dungeon, taking a bloody vengeance with spell and claw upon any adventurer who crosses her path.This cat doesn't have nine lives, but just one death isn't going to be enough to put her down for good.***“It dooth appéere that there is in Cats as in all other kindes of beasts, a certaine reason and language wherby they vnderstand one another. But as touching this Grimmalkin: I take rather to be an Hagat or a VVitch then a Cat. For witches haue gone often in that likenes, And therof hath come the prouerb as trew as common, that a Cat hath nine liues, that is to say, a witch may take on her a Cats body nine times.” -William Baldwin, “Beware the Cat”, 1584 |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 Trivia](#Trivia)
- [6 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Natasha, Servant of Life and Death** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [felid](/Felid_\(monster\) "Felid (monster)") wizard. Although not very durable, she is fast and capable of [summoning imps](/Call_Imp "Call Imp") to her aid, as well as inflicting irresistible damage at any range and disabling you with [status effects](/Status_effect "Status effect"). On top of all that, she has three lives; when killed, she will respawn elsewhere on the floor twice before finally dying for good.

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):2-4

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                              |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Magic Dart](/Magic_Dart "Magic Dart") (3d4) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Slow](/Slow "Slow")                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Call Imp](/Call_Imp "Call Imp")             | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Her summons can quickly turn the fight into a disastrous situation. Consider retreating and returning later if she manages to get a sizable imp army up before you can reach her. Remember that summons will vanish as soon as the summoner is defeated (even if she still has extra lives.)
- Natasha can wield wands and has been known to spawn with a [wand of polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") in addition to her own Slow spell. Be cautious if you have low [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower").
- If you are trying to track her down after she's respawned in an otherwise cleared-out level, consider reading any previously discarded [scrolls of noise](/Scroll_of_noise "Scroll of noise") or even deliberately setting off an [alarm trap](/Alarm_trap "Alarm trap") to help draw her out.
  - If you hear an "angry hissing noise", then she's within earshot and will be coming your way momentarily.

## Trivia

Although never explicitly stated, the (now removed) [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") [dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") [Morg](/Morg "Morg") once belonged to a "powerful mage called [Boris](/Boris "Boris")" who "got lost in the Dungeon while seeking the Orb." Given Natasha's flavour text, this strongly suggests that Natasha was once the unique [lich](/Lich "Lich") Boris' familiar, making the pair into one of *Crawl'*s [sneakier pop culture references.](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Rocky_and_Bullwinkle_Show)

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), [Call Imp](/Call_Imp "Call Imp") created either [crimson imps](/Crimson_imp "Crimson imp"), [white imps](/White_imp "White imp"), [shadow imps](/Shadow_imp "Shadow imp"), or [iron imps](/Iron_imp "Iron imp"). They were replaced by the spear wielding [cerulean imp](/Cerulean_imp "Cerulean imp").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Natasha became weaker upon revival.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), Natasha knew [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud").
- Natasha was added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Natasha

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Natasha h 
HP 9-20
HD 3
XP 35
Speed 10 (move: 80%)
AC 2
EV 12
Will 20
Attack1 10 (claw: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Little
Type felid, felid
Flags
See invisible
Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
A magical cat. Once a powerful wizard's familiar, Natasha was abandoned after her master was consumed by the very necromantic forces he sought to control. Now she patrols the dungeon, taking a bloody vengeance with spell and claw upon any adventurer who crosses her path.

This cat doesn't have nine lives, but just one death isn't going to be enough to put her down for good.

“It dooth appéere that there is in Cats as in all other kindes of beasts, a certaine reason and language wherby they vnderstand one another. But as touching this Grimmalkin: I take rather to be an Hagat or a VVitch then a Cat. For witches haue gone often in that likenes, And therof hath come the prouerb as trew as common, that a Cat hath nine liues, that is to say, a witch may take on her a Cats body nine times.”
-William Baldwin, “Beware the Cat”, 1584

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 Trivia
  • 6 History

Useful Info

Natasha, Servant of Life and Death is a unique felid wizard. Although not very durable, she is fast and capable of summoning imps to her aid, as well as inflicting irresistible damage at any range and disabling you with status effects. On top of all that, she has three lives; when killed, she will respawn elsewhere on the floor twice before finally dying for good.

Location

  • The Dungeon:2-4

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Magic Dart (3d4) Wizard flag
Slot2 Slow Wizard flag
Slot3 Call Imp Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Her summons can quickly turn the fight into a disastrous situation. Consider retreating and returning later if she manages to get a sizable imp army up before you can reach her. Remember that summons will vanish as soon as the summoner is defeated (even if she still has extra lives.)
  • Natasha can wield wands and has been known to spawn with a wand of polymorph in addition to her own Slow spell. Be cautious if you have low willpower.
  • If you are trying to track her down after she's respawned in an otherwise cleared-out level, consider reading any previously discarded scrolls of noise or even deliberately setting off an alarm trap to help draw her out.
    • If you hear an "angry hissing noise", then she's within earshot and will be coming your way momentarily.

Trivia

Although never explicitly stated, the (now removed) unrand dagger Morg once belonged to a "powerful mage called Boris" who "got lost in the Dungeon while seeking the Orb." Given Natasha's flavour text, this strongly suggests that Natasha was once the unique lich Boris' familiar, making the pair into one of Crawl's sneakier pop culture references.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, Call Imp created either crimson imps, white imps, shadow imps, or iron imps. They were replaced by the spear wielding cerulean imp.
  • Prior to 0.18, Natasha became weaker upon revival.
  • Prior to 0.16, Natasha knew Mephitic Cloud.
  • Natasha was added in 0.14.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Natasha&oldid=76247"

rawPage:
{{version|030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Natasha, Servant of Life and Death''' is a [[unique]] [[felid (monster)|felid]] wizard. Although not very durable, she is fast and capable of [[Call Imp|summoning imps]] to her aid, as well as inflicting irresistible damage at any range and disabling you with [[status effect]]s. On top of all that, she has three lives; when killed, she will respawn elsewhere on the floor twice before finally dying for good.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:2-4

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Her summons can quickly turn the fight into a disastrous situation. Consider retreating and returning later if she manages to get a sizable imp army up before you can reach her. Remember that summons will vanish as soon as the summoner is defeated (even if she still has extra lives.)
*Natasha can wield wands and has been known to spawn with a [[wand of polymorph]] in addition to her own Slow spell. Be cautious if you have low [[willpower]].
*If you are trying to track her down after she's respawned in an otherwise cleared-out level, consider reading any previously discarded [[scroll of noise|scrolls of noise]] or even deliberately setting off an [[alarm trap]] to help draw her out.
**If you hear an "angry hissing noise", then she's within earshot and will be coming your way momentarily.

==Trivia==
Although never explicitly stated, the (now removed) [[unrand]] [[dagger]] [[Morg]] once belonged to a "powerful mage called [[Boris]]" who "got lost in the Dungeon while seeking the Orb." Given Natasha's flavour text, this strongly suggests that Natasha was once the unique [[lich]] Boris' familiar, making the pair into one of ''Crawl'''s [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Rocky_and_Bullwinkle_Show sneakier pop culture references.]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], [[Call Imp]] created either [[crimson imp]]s, [[white imp]]s, [[shadow imp]]s, or [[iron imp]]s. They were replaced by the spear wielding [[cerulean imp]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], Natasha became weaker upon revival.
*Prior to [[0.16]], Natasha knew [[Mephitic Cloud]].
*Natasha was added in [[0.14]].
